lines: 1. Timanja tigwire ntchito yace, Lilime limlemekeze,
Makuatu amve mau ace, Mau ayimbetu nyimbo
2. Timapazi tiyende mâ€™njirayo, Yopita nayo kumwamba;
Timaso tiwerenge Bible, Linena cikondi cace.
3. Kamtima ndipereke kwa Yesu, Apulumutse moyowu
Kuti ndigwire ntchitoyace, Ndikhaletu wace konse.
